parameters.functionCode:
// Ransomware group database with IOCs
const ransomwareDatabase = [
  {
    name: 'Akira',
    type: 'RaaS',
    status: 'ACTIVE',
    prevalence: '34% (Most prevalent Q3 2025)',
    firstSeen: '2023-01-01',
    lastActivity: '2025-12-01',
    attackVector: ['VPN exploitation', 'Phishing', 'Credential stuffing'],
    targetIndustries: ['Manufacturing', 'Technology', 'Healthcare'],
    targetRegions: ['United States', 'Germany', 'UK', 'Canada'],
    encryptionExtension: '.akira',
    ransomNote: ['README.txt', 'README.akira'],
    doubleExtortion: true,
    esxiTargeting: true,
    iocs: {
      processPatterns: [
        'vssadmin.exe Delete /ShadowCopyAll',
        'vssadmin.exe Delete Shadows /All /Quiet',
        'cipher.exe /w:C:\\\\',
        'bcdedit /set {current} recoveryenabled No',
        'wbadmin delete catalog -quiet'
      ],
      filePatterns: [
        '*_readme.txt',
        '*_readme.akira',
        '*.akira extension'
      ],
      networkPatterns: [
        'Lateral movement via SMB/RDP',
        'Data exfiltration before encryption',
        'Tor exit node connections'
      ]
    },
    severity: 'CRITICAL'
  },
  {
    name: 'Qilin',
    type: 'RaaS',
    status: 'ACTIVE',
    prevalence: '10%',
    firstSeen: '2022-06-01',
    lastActivity: '2025-12-01',
    attackVector: ['VPN', 'RDP', 'Phishing'],
    targetIndustries: ['Finance', 'Healthcare', 'Manufacturing'],
    doubleExtortion: true,
    iocs: {
      fileExtension: '.qilin',
      ransomNote: 'README_QILIN.txt'
    },
    severity: 'HIGH'
  },
  {
    name: 'CoinbaseCartel',
    type: 'RaaS',
    status: 'ACTIVE',
    firstSeen: '2024-01-01',
    lastActivity: '2025-12-06',
    attackVector: ['Ransomware deployment'],
    targetIndustries: ['Technology', 'Semiconductors'],
    notableVictims: ['Renesas Electronics'],
    severity: 'HIGH'
  },
  {
    name: 'LockBit',
    type: 'RaaS',
    status: 'DISRUPTED',
    firstSeen: '2019-09-01',
    lastActivity: '2024-02',
    attackVector: ['RDP', 'VPN', 'Phishing'],
    doubleExtortion: true,
    severity: 'MEDIUM',
    note: 'Disrupted by Operation Cronos, may have residual activity'
  },
  {
    name: 'Clop/Cl0p',
    type: 'RaaS',
    status: 'ACTIVE',
    firstSeen: '2019-02-01',
    lastActivity: '2025-12-01',
    attackVector: ['MFA fatigue', 'VPN', 'Supply chain'],
    targetIndustries: ['Enterprise', 'Technology', 'Healthcare'],
    notableCampaigns: ['Oracle EBS exploitation'],
    doubleExtortion: true,
    severity: 'HIGH'
  }
];

return ransomwareDatabase.map(r => ({ json: r }));

parameters.subject: =ðŸš¨ CRITICAL: {{ $json.ransomwareGroup }} Ransomware Active - Immediate Response Required

meta.author: CyberSentinel Agent
meta.description: Ransomware detection with early-stage identification and business context
